chapters.title: Chapter 39: Threads in the Pattern
chapters.info: Avendoraldera, p. 444 (356)—Tree grown from a cutling from Avendesora, the legendary Tree of Life. It was a gift for the Cairhienin from the Aiel over 500 years ago. When King Laman cut it down, it precipitated the Aiel War. See also Avendesora; Damodred, Laman.
